#summary Here are some improvements that are planned for future releases.
#labels Featured

  # Continued integration of native BAM support.
  # Native support for "gzipped" BED and GFF files.
  # New tool: annotateBed.  Will allow one to compare one BED file to many others in a single command.
  # Reduced memory consumption and increased speed.
  # Potential "drawing" tools for overlaps, etc.
